DOC.brief_summary: Robot assist prostatectomy reduces patient ' postoperative pain lead rapid rehabilitation . But pneumoperitoneum affect kidney . The increase stress hormone reduce glomerular filtration vaso-contraction renal vessel lead renal ischemia . Remifentanil analgesic couple μ opioid receptor . In high dose remifentanil , associate κ δ receptor , lead renal protection effect animal study . Also , remifentanil infusion anesthesia show diuretic effect . The purpose study investigate remifentanil effect renal function robot assist prostatectomy .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Different Doses Remifentanil Kidney Function During Robot Assisted Prostatectomy - A Retrospective Study
DOC.criteria: age > 19 year < 85 year patient undergo general anesthesia robot assist prostatectomy incomplete record history opioid steroid use solitary kidney history kidney transplantation
